transArray.content: The cleanliness and arrangement of items in the room are quite good. The only drawback is that there are spiders in the room.

Dear guest, first of all, thank you for your recognition of the hotel's hygiene and other services. After receiving your call, we conducted a comprehensive search and observation of the room as soon as possible. Although we did not see the spider you mentioned, we also immediately inspected the room. I contacted the disinfection company. Our hotel has a professional cooperation company that has carried out comprehensive disinfection work. The hotel is a new product. Both the public area and the guest room restaurant are very clean and hygienic. It has been praised by many guests. Please You can check in with peace of mind
